EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_UnlockingOperationalEfficiencyBOSH_WP_Q317.Download C
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Unlocking Operational Efficiency with BOSH
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Unlocking Operational Efficiency with BOSH white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your cloud-native journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- About BOSH <[[http://bosh.io/docs/about.html]]>
- What problems does BOSH <[[https://bosh.io/docs/problems.html]]> solve?
- Blog: Building Cloud Foundry On-Demand Services Just Got a Lot Easier <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/building-cloud-foundry-on-demand-services-just-got-a-lot-easier]]>
- InfoQ: BOSH - Twenty Years of Deployment Lessons in One Tool <[[https://www.infoq.com/presentations/bosh-cloud-foundry]]>
- Podcast: Tell Me More About BOSH <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/all-things-pivotal-podcast-episode-16-tell-me-more-about-bosh]]>
- Video: Cloud-Native Security: Rotate, Repair, Repave <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cloud-native-security/cloud-native-security-rotate-repair-repave-justin-smith]]>
- eBook: Embarking on the Cloud-Native Journey to More Agile IT <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/embarking-on-the-cloud-native-journey-to-more-agile-it]]>
- Blog Post: Immutable Infrastructure, Windows, and BOSH <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/immutable-infrastructure-windows-and-bosh]]>
- Web Page: Kubo: BOSH-Powered, Web Scale Release Engineering for Kubernetes <[[https://pivotal.io/partners/kubo]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you,The Pivotal Team
